channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Financial Transaction Manager for SWIFT Services
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Financial Transaction Manager for SWIFT Services

item.title: CVE-2023-35892|2024-08-02T16:37:39.913Z -- ibm -- financial%20transaction%20manager%20for%20swift%20services
item.description: IBM Financial Transaction Manager for SWIFT Services 3.2.4 is vulnerable to an XML External Entity Injection (XXE) attack when processing XML data. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to expose sensitive information or consume memory resources. IBM X-Force ID: 258786.
